title: Do not push your lane IF ienvy is your supp
body:
Hi all,

I just had a solo queue ranked game, where I played Draven as adc. My supp was Morgana, played by a player called 'ienvy'. We were vs Lucian and Leona and eight minutes into the game, I was 23 cs ahead of Lucian and he was stuck under his turrent. Morgana was right behind me in the bush so I was kind of focusing on my farm and poking enemy whenever they tried to kill a minion. I was not paying enough attention to chat but I had my eyes on the map, in case of a gang. Soon after Voli came to gang me and I turned to the lucian who was half hp, expecting morgana will shield me and possibly get two kills as voli was under lvl. However, my supp turns around and walks away and I died after killing Lucian in 1 v 3. As I pressed enter to activate my chat to ask to Morgana, why s/he walked away, I noticed that s/he called the enemy jungler to gang me, just because s/he was pissed off with the fact that I pushed my lane and locked enemy under their turrent (Morgana never said a word to me or pinged). I have seen many people fighting and going afk or feeding intentionally but this one was (in my opinion) just epic (although beyond my understanding) so I wanted to share this experience with those of you who cares about playing with good people to have fun. 

Good gamings

ll 000 ll

replies.body: It's like the 5th time in a week I've seen that mistake.
I am sorry. English is my third language and I make spelling mistakes here and there.

so...cost your own lane by playing counter to how your lane partner wanted, didnt bother reading chat, didnt pay any attention to anything but yourself...

sounds like the usual selfish draven player. you deserve every loss you ever get.

How to not push lane with draven and get stax without losing mana to keep axes going? R u dense? his support is dumb for doing that. But the OP is dumber for baiting people and name and shaming and ranting on boards.

thats pin pointing 1 point of error by the OP. it was miss communication, but still the same attitude from every draven player i have met in a long time. they go in thinking they can win any fight, without even looking to see anything but themselves. which is exactly what he did. solo pushed the lane and expected to win a 3 vs 1-2.  draven players just have the worst attitude of all ADC players. even worse, this kid comes to the forums/boards and name and shames and you DEFEND the little %%%%? REALLY? since when have we sided with name and shamers?

If morg was to stay and Lucian was half health as the OP said they could have 2v3d for sure that's if they ignored the voli and instakilled lucian and just kited volibear or the support. That's *IF* the op is a good Draven player and can manage his axe catching. {{champion:119}} op

If you can read my post, you will notice that I have mentioned how Morgana did not say a word to me about my play style. S/he could tell me not to push if s/he did not like it, rather than calling enemt jungler to gang me. I ll take your crit about my lack of focus on chat but the rest of your comment sounds a bit toxic and full of hate :(

ps: who said I lost the game?

didnt say you lose the game, i said you deserve every loss you ever get. the more the merrier.

you ignored everything but your own solo pushing the lane, the rest is the attitude of draven players and how toxic the new passive has made such players, much more selfish than other ADC and just terrible for the game.
Morgana did the right thing, why give them two kills because you were over extended.
People tend to be less stupid the higher you climb, that in mind, expect to see a lot of morons in silver/bronze.
